participant_abstract.sent: There was general agreement among the participants that this was a practical and trendy model that meets our financial capabilities.
The fruit models that were introduced at the beginning of the meeting decidedly not of shapes that are practical to use.
We decided on a more 'joystick'-like shape that would maybe have fruit colours or designs, in keeping with the trend of fruit.

participant_decisions.sent: -our production costs were met. 'joystick' shape for final model of remote control.

participant_problems.sent: The fruit shapes were not practical/comfortable to hold.
